## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I've been hearing a lot about Sapling lately. Can you tell me more about it and how it improves the VerusCoin blockchain?

**AI Assistant:**
Sapling is an upgrade to the VerusCoin blockchain that brings significant improvements to the platform. With Sapling, users can enjoy faster shielded transactions, with some reports of near 1-second and even sub-1-second transaction times. This upgrade also enables the use of revolutionary features like Stake Guard, a Crypto-Condition that helps prevent cheated stake blocks and solves the "Nothing at Stake" problem in Proof of Stake systems. Do you have any questions about Stake Guard or how it works?

**User:**
Actually, yes! What is Stake Guard, and how does it benefit the VerusCoin network?

**AI Assistant:**
Stake Guard is a Crypto-Condition introduced in Verus Wallet v0.4.0c that helps prevent cheated stake blocks and solves the "Nothing at Stake" problem in Proof of Stake systems. This feature enables the network to detect and catch cheaters, ensuring a more secure and reliable blockchain. It's a game-changer for the VerusCoin network, and we're excited to see the impact it will have.

**User:**
That sounds really important. What are the benefits of upgrading to Verus Wallet v0.4.0c or later?

**AI Assistant:**
Upgrading to Verus Wallet v0.4.0c or later brings several benefits, including the activation of Sapling support, Stake Guard, and other improved features. Users can enjoy faster shielded transactions, improved security, and a more reliable blockchain experience. It's definitely worth upgrading to take advantage of these improvements.

**User:**
I've heard that the Sapling upgrade improves transaction performance. Can you tell me more about that?

**AI Assistant:**
Yes, the Sapling upgrade significantly improves the performance of VerusCoin transactions. In tests, shielding times have been reduced to around 1.29 seconds, compared to 6-10 minutes prior to the upgrade. This is a huge improvement and will make a big difference for users. The Sapling upgrade is a major milestone for VerusCoin, and we're excited to see the impact it will have on the community.

Title: VerusCoin Successfully Activates Sapling with New Improvements to Verus Wallet, Electrum Server…
Article URL: https://medium.com/veruscoin/veruscoin-successfully-activates-sapling-with-new-improvements-to-verus-wallet-electrum-server-35b44d8bad5c
Content:VerusCoin Successfully Activates Sapling with New Improvements to Verus Wallet, Electrum Server and Pool Software
Latest Developments: Verus Wallet v0.4.0c and later with Stake Guard (NoS Solution) and Other Improved Features; Verus Electrum Server with Sapling Support; Sapling Compatible Pool SoftwareThe Sapling upgrade has activated on VerusCoin blockchain at blockheight 227520 and the latest innovations, improvements and features are now active for all users running Verus Wallet v0.4.0c and newer. Users are already actively taking some of the revolutionary features for a “spin” with reports of near 1 second (and some sub-1 second) shielded transactions!
In tests with a basic 1GB VPS, for example, I clocked 1.29sec shielding time for shielding a coinbase. This same server would utilize nearly 4 GB of Swap and take between 6 and 10 minutes prior to the activation.
If you have not yet upgraded, follow these steps to upgrade to the latest version now:
How to Update or Install Verus GUI Wallet v0.4.0h for Linux or Windows
Verus Wallet v0.4.0c Release Notes
This update, released prior to Sapling activation on the VerusCoin blockchain, includes some important and groundbreaking features and tech. Verus v0.4.0 saw the innovation and advancements of Sapling support, the first Crypto-Condition “Stake Guard” which implements a mechanism for finding and catching cheated stake blocks and effectively solving “Nothing at Stake”…the big Proof of Stake theoretical problem.
In the “c” and later (currently at “h”) edition of Verus, a few new exciting improvements and features have been added.
Catching Cheaters
